title: Talking Back - image of "cheap diaries" serves

content.question: The image of "cheap diaries that soon fell apart from too much handling" (Paragraph 6) serves primarily to

choices.label: evoke the fleeting nature of childhood
underline the destructive effects of self-expression
convey indirectly the author's childhood compulsion to write
convey the author's desire for a wider audience

content.answer: convey indirectly the author's childhood compulsion to write

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
